name: Button
description: Button with variations on kind and sizing.

attributes.description: Control visibility but leave in the DOM.
attributes.name: concealed

attributes.description: Determines if the button can be interacted with by the user.
attributes.name: disabled

attributes.description: Used in flex box to stretch sizing.
attributes.name: grow

attributes.description: Control visibility and do not leave in the DOM.
attributes.name: hidden

attributes.description: Relative path to an icon to place on the button.
attributes.name: icon

attributes.description: Relative path to an icon to place on the button when in a disabled state. The icon attribute must be provided for this path to be applied.
attributes.name: icon-disabled

attributes.description: Relative path to an icon to place on the button when in is pressed by user interaction. The icon attribute must be provided for this path to be applied.
attributes.name: icon-down

attributes.description: Relative path to an icon to place on the button when in is hovered over by user interaction. The icon attribute must be provided for this path to be applied.
attributes.name: icon-over

attributes.description: Kind of button to present.
attributes.name: kind

attributes.description: The label placed on the button.
attributes.name: label

attributes.description: Apply spacing to the bottom of the underlying button implementation in order to nudge in place for pixel perfection.
attributes.name: margin-bottom

attributes.description: Apply spacing to the left of the underlying button implementation in order to nudge in place for pixel perfection.
attributes.name: margin-left

attributes.description: Apply spacing to the right of the underlying button implementation in order to nudge in place for pixel perfection.
attributes.name: margin-right

attributes.description: Apply spacing to the top of the underlying button implementation in order to nudge in place for pixel perfection.
attributes.name: margin-top

attributes.description: Size of button to present. Refers specifically to the button height.
attributes.name: size

attributes.description: Applied to title attribute of underlying button implementation. Useful for native tooltips.
attributes.name: title

name: Checkbox
description: Button styled to behave like a checkbox.

attributes.description: Select or not. Mirrors checked value of input.
attributes.name: checked

attributes.description: Control visibility but leave in the DOM.
attributes.name: concealed

attributes.description: Determines if the checkbox can be interacted with by the user.

attributes.description: Control visibility but remove from the DOM.

attributes.description: Height of the label container. Also sets line height to same value for vertical centering.

attributes.name: hidden

attributes.description: Theme for the background when used on darker surfaces.

attributes.name: disabled

attributes.description: Message to present in the case of an error.

attributes.description: Used in flex box to stretch sizing.

attributes.description: Additional text used as instructions to the user.
attributes.name: helper

attributes.description: Control visibility and do not leave in the DOM.
attributes.name: hidden

attributes.description: Label the component so the user knows how to use it.
attributes.name: label

attributes.description: Toggle contrast to white background.
attributes.name: light

attributes.description: Apply spacing to the bottom of the underlying button implementation in order to nudge in place for pixel perfection.

attributes.description: Allow the field to be populated with readable content, but not allowed to be edited.
attributes.name: readonly

attributes.description: Reflected in the tooltip of the field. Also used for accessibility.
attributes.name: title

attributes.description: Width of the control.
attributes.name: width

attributes.description: Control visibility but leave in the DOM.
attributes.name: concealed

attributes.description: Convenience for adjusting color when used inside components that can be functionally disabled.
attributes.name: disabled

attributes.description: Control visibility and do not leave in the DOM.
attributes.name: hidden

attributes.description: Mark such that text cannot be selected in any way.
attributes.name: internal

attributes.description: The textual content of the label to display.
attributes.name: text

attributes.description: Applied to title attribute of underlying button implementation. Useful for native tooltips.
attributes.name: title

attributes.description: Text in label will wrap by default. Truncation will limit to single line with ellipsis in accordance with containers width.
attributes.name: truncate

properties.description: Arbitrary storage for values related to the function of the component.
properties.name: data

styles.description: Color of the font used in the label.
styles.name: --color

styles.description: Type of cursor to be displayed with mouse interaction.
styles.name: --cursor

styles.description: Type of cursor to be displayed with mouse interaction.
styles.name: --disabled-color

styles.description: Font size of the label. Adjustable for headers, emphasis, etc.
styles.name: --font-size

styles.description: Font weight of the label. Adjustable thickness for emphasis.
styles.name: --font-weight

styles.description: Height of the label container. Also sets line height to same value for vertical centering.
styles.name: --height

styles.description: Alignment of the text within the label.
styles.name: --text-align
